mutants.code:
def minimize_sum_of_differences(n, k, A):
    p = sorted(A)
    m = n / k
    d = n % k
    u = d + 1
    v = k - d + 1
    g = [0] * (u * v)
    i = 0
    for a in range(u):
        j = a * m + a - 1
        for b in range(v):
            x = g[i - 1] + p[j] - p[j - m + 1] if b else 9000000000.0
            y = g[i - v] + p[j] - p[j - m] if a else 9000000000.0
            if i:
                g[i] = min(x, y)
            i += 1
            j += m
    return g[-1]

def minimize_sum_of_differences(n, k, A):
    p = sorted(A)
    m = n // k
    d = n % k
    u = d + 1
    v = k - d + 1
    g = [0] * (u * v)
    i = 0
    for a in range(u):
        j = a * m + a - 2
